issue.title: [C++] Vendor uriparser library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7169](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7169). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The [uriparser C library](https://github.com/uriparser/uriparser)  is used internally for URI parsing. Instead of having an explicit dependency, we could simply vendor it.
